description: Mr. 5 uses his Bomu Bomu no Mi ability to create explosive attacks with his kicks, expanding the known applications of his explosive powers beyond breath and boogers.
firstUseContext: Mr. 5 demonstrates the Kick Bomb technique while attacking the Straw Hats at Dorry's camp on Little Garden.

description: Mr. 3 creates life-sized wax sculptures that closely resemble real people, used to deceive and trap opponents.
firstUseContext: Mr. 3 creates a wax duplicate of Luffy to distract and capture Nami in Little Garden's jungle.
limitations: Can be identified upon close inspection

description: Mr. 3 creates a liquid wax substance that is extremely slippery, causing opponents to lose their footing during combat.
firstUseContext: Mr. 3 places slippery wax under Dorry's foot during his duel with Brogy, causing Dorry to slip and be defeated.

description: Mr. 3 encases opponents in iron-hard wax that immobilizes them. The hardened wax is as strong as steel and effective even against giant-sized opponents.
firstUseContext: Mr. 3 traps Brogy by encasing the giant's feet in hardened wax, then begins covering his entire body.
limitations: Vulnerable to fire and high heat
Takes time to fully encase large opponents
